Title: Teaching
About:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Travel to the student's location & deliver lessons
2. Teach any preferential class from nursery to 12th (academics)
3. Teach at your preferential zones (nearby your locality)
4. Teach from 14 hours/week to 48 hours/week
Detail: Nerdy Academy is a professional home service provider for students of classes nursery to 12. We revolutionize the tutoring industry with one-to-one education. Nerdy was founded in the June of 2013. Since then we have been evolving, enchanting, and happening to cities, people, tutors, and ideas. With a workforce of 200 tutors in each city, Nerdy is growing, one city at a time. Our tutors are wide & versatile in their qualifications & designations. We aim to cover the globe. We'll make learning personalized. We'll eliminate unemployment by generating jobs. Believe us when we say, we can & we will. We are operational in the cities of Indore, Bhopal, Raipur, Bhilai & Durg.

Title: Digital Marketing
About:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Develop a brand style guide to ensure consistency in marketing efforts
2. Create a multi-channel marketing content strategy
3. Manage external partners for marketing collateral creation
4. Track KPIs of marketing campaigns
5. Write marketing messages for online and offline campaigns
6. Create an editorial calendar
7. Plan and execute all digital marketing, including SEO/SEM, marketing database, email
8. Identify trends and insights, and optimize spend and performance based on the insights
9. Brainstorm new and creative growth strategies
10. Plan, execute, and measure experiments and conversion tests
11. Collaborate with internal teams to create landing pages and optimize the user experience
12. Utilize the strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across multiple channels and customer touch points
13. Instrument conversion points and optimize user funnels
14. Evaluate emerging technologies. Provide thought leadership and perspective for adoption where appropriate
Detail:
Carfy India Private Limited is a Private incorporated on 17 October 2019. It is classified as Non-govt company and is registered at Registrar of Companies, Chhattisgarh.
CARFY online car accessories app has widest range of products on wholesale price

CARFY ONLINE Car Accessories Shop App has the range of accessories.

Car Stereo & Car accessories : carfy car accessories online shop app in India, now available on google play store for Android Mobile App. We offer car accessories, car stereo android range and parts in retail as well as wholesale all over in India with doorstep delivery.

We offer a wide range of Genuine Car Accessories App in India.
Skill: ['Creative Writing', 'Digital Marketing', 'Email Marketing', 'English Proficiency (Spoken)', 'English Proficiency (Written)', 'Facebook Marketing', 'Instagram Marketing', 'Search Engine Marketing (SEM)', 'Search Engine Optimization (SEO)', 'Social Media Marketing']

Title: Social Media Marketing
About:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Work alongside the team to create a plan for social media strategies monthly
2. Assist in the growth of the brand by raising awareness through various social media platforms
3. Monitor postings to ensure the brand message is constant from the terminology used to images posted
4. Aid in the daily aspects of promoting the businesses campaigns
5. Interact with followers and potential customers by communicating and answering questions through the company's social pages
6. Assist in implementing plans to increase followers on popular social media websites such as Twitter, Pinterest, Facebook, YouTube, and LinkedIn
7. Oversee the creation and implementation of a monthly editorial that includes monthly sales objectives and initiatives
8. Help create content as dictated by the monthly editorial calendar to promote sales, blogs, and products
9. Work with the social media marketing managers to run ads, plan campaigns, and publish content
Detail: Digi Jugad Private Limited is a new age and young 360-degree marketing agency, helping brands and businesses generate leads for new-age startups and small businesses. As a marketing agency, we focus on the overall growth of a brand by engaging in 360-degree marketing.

Title: Digital Marketing
About:

1. Work with the digital marketing manager to refine social media strategy and best practices
2. Assist in managing social media channels (Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest Instagram, LinkedIn) and editorial calendar to ensure content is timely, relevant, and engaging
3. Manage search engine rankings and approachability (Like Google, YouTube, etc.)

5. Keep up to date and informed on new social media trends and adapt accordingly

Title: Goonj Grassroots Fellowship 2021-22
Opening:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Learning in-depth about issues like infrastructural development, menstrual health, education, livelihood and disaster relief-rehabilitation etc.
2. Working on ground with Goonj operational and field teams in Assam, Bundelkhand, Chattisgarh, Odisha, Karnataka, Rajasthan, Bihar, Maharashtra, Delhi, Tamil Nadu, West Bengal, etc.
3. Capacity building workshops, shadowing experience with sector specialists apart from hands on training about key skills like communication, financial planning, monitoring and evaluation etc.
About: Goonj Grassroot Fellowship is a year-long program, where fellows will be working in various areas by engaging with the communities on ground. During the one year, fellows interact with various communities from villages as well as cities and get a deeper understanding of the realities and devise ways to act upon the needs of the communities by engaging the communities.
Detail: Goonj envisions to grow as an idea across regions, economies, and countries using urban discard as a tool to alleviate poverty and enhance the dignity of the poor in the world. Address basic but neglected issues of the poor by involving them in evolving their own solutions with dignity and urban material as a reward.
